name: StarTech ST1000SPEXD2 2 x Gigabit Ethernet PCIe x1 Network Adapter
Features: [Chipset ID: Realtek RTL8111C, Maximum Data Transfer Rate: 1000 Mbps (uni-directional), 2000 Mbps (bi-directional), OS Compatibility: Windows 98SE/ ME/ 2000/ XP (32/64-bit)/ Server 2003 (32/64-bit)/ Vista (32/64-bit)/ Server 2008 R2/ 7 (32/64-bit), WinCE 4.2/ 5.0 Linux Kernel 2.4.x and later Mac OS 10.4 (Intel-based) SCO OpenServer 5.0.7/ 6, and Novell, Jumbo Frame support, Supports Microsoft NDIS5 Checksum Offload (IP, TCP, UDP) and Large send Offload, Supports Wake-on-LAN and Remote Wake-up Support, Pair Swap/Polarity/Skew Correction, Crossover Detection & Auto-Correction (Auto MDIX)]
